metadata.title: CVE-2020-12414 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: IndexedDB should be cleared when leaving private browsing mode and it isnot, the API for WKWebViewConfiguration was being used incorrectly andrequires the private instance of this object be deleted when leavingprivate mode. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 27.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
